title: Low fps
body: Recently I've been getting low fps, regardless of setting changed I've even updated my graphics card.

replies.body:
Seems you've already done some good preliminary steps. To be safe though, I also suggest running through the [**FPS KB over here**](http://riot.com/2dlHSAF) for some extra steps to troubleshoot with!

Also, can you tell me if you're on Win10? Recently Windows did release an update so it could have turned on Game DVR; multiple times we've noticed that it decreases your FPS in game, so make extra sure that it's disabled if you're on that OS and see if it helps your FPS. ^^
